S.FORM: Steve Alford siwkay niza 11 bulad 23 demiad, 1964 a mihca, Steve Alford, miunduay. Steve Alford nalecuhan i Franklin, Indiana, nanu syubay kanas mali miunduay nu Amilika NBA nisakaput. Steve Alford i 1987 a mihcan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka 2 ku uwac atu silsil 26, namapili' tu nu Dallas Mavericks putiput. Steve Alford unu syubay kanas mali miunduay nu Amilika NBA nisakaput, u misimaw zikuzay mimaliay, u mikilac zikuzay mimaliay. kakuniza nu kawaw namakayniay a nasulitan nasakamuan atu natinengan Lists of National Basketball Association players
